docs.text: Disclaimer The analyses and visualizations on this site do not reflect official views of any kind. The results are subject to interpretation, data cleaning, ingesting, processing, and algorithmic and computational limitation issues. There may also be some errors (we have cleaned them up to our knowledge) due to document conversions to a machine readable form. The analyses have been done in good faith in a spirit of free inquiry. We do not recommend that content from this website be cited as independently reviewed and validated research. Any suggestions and corrections are welcome.
